values: 漫步；闲逛；游荡；徘徊；漫游；偏离；脱离；迷路；走失；慢慢地移开；蜿蜒前进；漂泊；流浪；背离；走神；
漫步；闲逛；溜达；徘徊；流浪；漂泊；走神；心不在焉；思绪飘忽

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 流浪的；漫游的，徘徊的；蜿蜒的
流浪者；漫游者；迷路的动物

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指无目的地到处徘徊或闲荡。
常指无明确目的他悠闲而缓慢地漫游。
常指在广阔地方以自得其乐的愉快心情作无固定目标的漫游。
一般指走走停停，心情愉快，步履轻松。

bilingual.source: He likes to wander in the park.
We wander through the streets of the city.
bilingual.target: 我们在城市的街道上徘徊。

bilingual.source: The children wander in the forest, looking for adventure.
bilingual.target: 孩子们在森林里徘徊，寻找冒险。

bilingual.source: I do not want to wander about any more.
Wander the hills in search of the fortune
bilingual.target: 在山间徘徊寻找他们的财富

bilingual.source: They come and go and wander at their will.
bilingual.target: 他们来来去去，徘徊在他们将。

bilingual.source: Like a lonesome wolf I wander around in my isolation.
bilingual.target: 像匹孤狼,我在与世隔绝中徘徊.

bilingual.source: To move or act aimlessly or vaguely; wander.
bilingual.target: 游荡，闲逛，徘徊无目的或无精打采地移动或行动；

bilingual.source: Lost souls wander alone. Your inner flame flares up.
bilingual.target: 那里漆黑一片，迷失的灵魂们都在独自徘徊，当你点燃你内心的火焰时，那些迷失的灵魂聚集在你的光和热附近。

bilingual.source: I wander and hesitate , ho , roam and rove in a slow pace.
bilingual.target: 吾踯躅而踌躇兮徘徊而容与 ﹒.

list.abstract: wander（英 [ˈwɒndə]，美 [ˈwɑːndər]），英语单词，作动词用，为漫游；漫步；闲逛。作名词用，为漫游；漫步；溜达。短语搭配有wander around（徘徊），例句为“Feel free to wander around as you please.（你想转就随便转吧。）” wander不及物动词类近义词有lose oneself、hang about，及物动词类近义词有range、louse around。wanderer为wander的名词形式。
《Wander》是一款由国外Loki Davison独立游戏工作室打造的题材非常新颖的网游。

yingyinNormal.en: To this day? No. He wandered until he could wander no more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直至今日吗？不，终于有一天他没法继续流浪了。

yingyinNormal.en: Wander where I'm gonna live? Paradise Falls. A land lost in time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想知道我要住哪里吗? 仙境瀑布，一个被人遗忘的大陆。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes Mummy. You're a very naughty Teddy. You must promise not to wander off ever again. Sorry, Peppa. I promise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，妈妈。你今天真是太淘气了，泰迪！你必须要答应我你以后都不会到处乱走。对不起，佩奇。我保证。

yingyinNormal.en: You wanna wander in the hall? Ooh, hey Ben, what if the Holiday Armadillo told you all about the festival of lights?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想在走廊晃荡吗？班，佳节犰狳跟你说光之节的故事好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It's no coincidence. He bought that house to be near her. He threw all those parties hoping she'd wander in one night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这绝非巧合，他买下那房子，就是为了接近她，他办那些派对，就是希望她能来一次。

yingyinNormal.en: Her attractions are never far apart, and in between, well, merely walking her streets is to wander through picture postcards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴黎各个景点彼此都相距不远，在前往下个景点的路上，就像走在风景明信片般的享受。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, honey that's awful. Oh, it's not so bad. Monica's gonna make potpourri. I think I'm gonna go wander out in the rain for a while.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是糟糕。还好啦，莫妮卡要用来做香料，我要去淋雨散散心。

yingyinNormal.en: I built your mind, Bernard. I have every right to wander through its rooms and chambers and halls, and to change it if I choose, even to burn it down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我创造了你的大脑，伯纳德，我有权游走于它的每个角落，想改变就改变，毁了它也不为过。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and it is my dying wish to have that ring. See, if I'm not buried with that ring then my spirit is going to wander the nether world for all eternity. Okay, that's enough honey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我临死前想拥有那枚戒指，要是不能戴着它入土，我会变成孤魂野鬼在阴间。够了，亲爱的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 走神; 开小差; 恍惚

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 漫步; 游荡; 徘徊

examination_example.sentence: A total of nine furry friends freely <highlight>wander</highlight> around in the office and do whatever their little hearts desire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总共有九个毛茸茸的朋友在办公室里到处自由地闲逛，随心所欲。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine you are <highlight>wandering</highlight> about on a Thai island or admiring the ruins of Angkor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象你在泰国的一个岛上漫步，或者正在欣赏吴哥窟的遗址。

examination_example.sentence: On one recent day, this doctor was Daniel Grenade, <highlight>wandering</highlight> the cereal aisle with Allison Scott, giving her some idea on how to feed kids who persistently avoid anything that is healthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近一天，医生丹尼尔·纳多(Daniel Nadeau)，与艾莉森·斯科特(Allison Scott)漫步在谷物过道上，给她出主意，告诉她如何喂养那些执意回避任何健康饮食的孩子。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 漫步; 漫游; 闲逛

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 漫游；漫步；闲逛；迷路；偏移；离开正道；蜿蜒；漫步于；不忠

sense_info_list.zh: 漫步; 漫游; 闲逛

examination_example.sentence: When I returned to London in 2004, I found myself <highlight>wandering</highlight> down to Southbank, spending hours there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2004年，当我回到伦敦时，我发现自己徘徊在南岸，在那里待了几个小时。

examination_example.sentence: The first step is to go exploring,if you're <highlight>wandering</highlight> into somebody's house for the first time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一步是去探索，如果你第一次走进别人的房子。

examination_example.sentence: The right level of background noise may interrupt our normal patterns of thinking just enough to allow our imaginations to <highlight>wander</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 适当水平的背景噪音可能会干扰我们正常的思维模式，足以让我们的想象力游荡。

examination_example.sentence: While riding his bike home on a cold night, he came across a sad-looking elderly woman <highlight>wandering</highlight> the streets by herself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一个寒冷的夜晚，当他骑自行车回家时，他遇到了一位面容忧伤的老妇人独自在街上徘徊。
人们的注意力不断游离。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 漫步; 漫游; 闲逛

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 漫游的；闲逛的；流浪的

word_family.mean: v. 漫游；漫步；闲逛；迷路；偏移；离开正道；蜿蜒；漫步于；不忠

sense_info_list.zh: 漫步; 漫游; 闲逛

examination_example.sentence: Amy carried the milk back to Mama, then <highlight>wandered</highlight> up the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾米把牛奶拿回给妈妈，然后漫步在路上。

examination_example.sentence: It's normal for the human mind to <highlight>wander</highlight> (走神).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人的思想会走神是很正常的。
